transcript:
of the table was a small carpet with var- ious figures worked upon it, at the other was something resembling an altar on which lay a Testament and a skull. Round it stood seven large candlesticks like those used in churches. Two of the brothers led Pierre up to the altar, placed his feet at right angles, and bade him lie down, saying that he must prostrate himself at the Gates of the Temple. 
"He must first receive the trowel," whispered one of the brothers. 
"Oh, hush, please!" said another
